title.en: My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought

altTitles.ru: Мое дорогое Я со злым умыслом

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinai naru Boku e Satsui o Komete

altTitles.ja: 親愛なる僕へ殺意をこめて

description.de:
Auf den ersten Blick scheint Eiji ein ganz normaler Student zu sein, doch er hat ein Geheimnis: sein verstorbener Vater war ein berüchtigter Serienmörder, der für seine extreme Grausamkeit bekannt war.
Eines Tages wacht Eiji neben einem schönen fremden Mädchen auf, das anscheinend in ihn verliebt ist und behauptet, seine Freundin zu sein, doch eigenartigerweise kann er sich nicht an sie erinnern. Die letzten Tage scheinen wie aus seinem Gedächtnis gelöscht, und es fühlt sich an, als hätte jemand anders die Kontrolle übernommen. Zur selben Zeit findet die örtliche Polizei eine aufs Übelste verstümmelte Leiche, und für sie besteht kein Zweifel: Eijis Vater ist zurück... doch kann das wirklich sein?
description.en: Urashima Eiji, a college student, goes to sleep after a fun drinking night with his friends. When he wakes up he discovers a beautiful girl next to him who treats him as if they are in a loving relationship. Later, Eiji finds out that 4 days have passed since he went out with his crew. What did he do during all that time and why does he have no memory of it? By confronting that reality, he will be caught in tragedy…
description.ne: एइजी, कलेज उमेरको कुमारले कुनै दिन प्रेमिका हुने सपना देख्छ... अनि एक दिन आफ्नो "प्रेमिका" को साथ आफ्नो ओछ्यानमा उठ्छ! त्यति मात्र होइन, उसको साथीले उसलाई बताउँछ कि ऊ झगडामा परेको छ ... र त्यो तीन दिन बितिसक्यो जुन एइजीलाई याद छैन? के अँध्यारो रहस्यहरू लुकाइरहेका छ ... एइजी आफैले?
description.ru:
Урашима Эйджи, студент колледжа, засыпает после веселой ночи с друзьями. Когда он просыпается, он обнаруживает рядом с собой красивую девушку, которая ведет себя с ним, как со своим парнем. Позже Эйджи узнает, что с того вечера прошло 3 дня. Что он делал все это время и почему не помнит ничего об этом? Столкнувшись с реальностью, он попадет в трагедию…  
  
Itou Shouta's Twitter: [@shota\_itooooo](https://twitter.com/shota_itooooo)
description.vi: Urashima Eiji, một sinh viên đại học, đi ngủ sau một đêm uống rượu vui vẻ với bạn bè. Khi tỉnh dậy, anh phát hiện ra một cô gái xinh đẹp bên cạnh, người đối xử với anh như thể họ đang trong một mối quan hệ yêu đương. Sau đó, anh phát hiện ra rằng 4 ngày đã trôi qua kể từ khi anh đi ra ngoài cùng với đám bạn của mình. Anh ấy đã làm gì trong suốt thời gian đó và tại sao anh ấy không có ký ức về nó?. Khi đối mặt với thực tế đó, anh sẽ bị cuốn vào bi kịch...

description.en: Kawada Sensei, the creator of Hinomaru Sumo, returns to Shonen Jump! Nito is living a quiet high school life while taking care of his disabled grandpa, but thanks to an encounter with a schoolmate striving to be a pro female MMA fighter, his life is about to flip. Sometimes, you just have to fight! This serious MMA story is an all-out battle!
description.pt-br: Kawada Sensei, o criador de Hinomaru Sumo, retorna à Shonen Jump! Nito está vivendo uma vida tranquila no ensino médio enquanto cuida de seu avô deficiente, mas graças a um encontro com uma colega de escola que se esforça para ser uma lutadora profissional de MMA, sua vida está prestes a mudar. Às vezes, você só precisa lutar! Essa história séria do MMA é uma batalha total!

description.en:
Riku experienced a lot of pain and tragedy in his early life. After his father's death, a former-boxer Yakuza man taught him how to do a basic punch, and that punch saved his life when he had to defend himself from his mom's drug dealer. He ended up taking the drug dealer's life, marking him as a killer. Criminals continued to come after him, leading to more tragedy for the people who attempted to care for him. All of this drove him to ask that same former boxer to teach him to become stronger, which led him to a rundown gym, his door to the world of pro boxing!  
  
**Officially published:**  
- In french by [Kazé](http://manga.kaze.fr/catalogue/ri_ku_la_rage_aux_poings) as "Riku-Do, La rage aux poings"  
- In italian by [J-Pop](https://www.j-pop.it/855-rikudo)
description.es: Riku Akutou, un chico que ha perdido a su padre, conoce a Kyosuke Tokorozawa, un antiguo boxeador que se dedica a cobrar deudas. En un mundo lleno de sinrazón, ¿qué utiliza la gente como guía para sobrevivir? ¿Pelearán? ¡Esta es la historia de la increíble lucha a puñetazos de Riku Akutou mientras recorre el espinoso camino de la vida!　El chico no tiene nada. Excepto por sus puños.
description.ja: 父親を失った少年・芥生リクは借金取りの元ボクサー・所沢京介と出会う。理不尽に満ちたこの世界で、人は何をよすがに生き抜くのか。戦うのか。人生という茨の道を歩む芥生リクの破格の拳闘ストーリー！　少年には何もない。その拳以外は。
description.es-la: Riku experimentó mucho dolor y tragedia en sus primeros años de vida. Tras la muerte de su padre, un antiguo boxeador de la Yakuza le enseñó a dar un puñetazo básico, y ese puñetazo le salvó la vida cuando tuvo que defenderse del traficante de drogas de su madre. Acabó quitándole la vida al traficante, marcándolo como un asesino. Los delincuentes siguieron persiguiéndolo, lo que provocó más tragedias para las personas que intentaron cuidarlo. Todo esto le llevó a pedir a ese mismo ex boxeador que le enseñara a ser más fuerte, lo que le llevó a un gimnasio en decadencia, ¡su puerta al mundo del boxeo profesional!
description.pt-br: Riku passou por muita dor e tragédia em sua vida precoce. Após a morte de seu pai, um ex-boxeador membro da máfia Yakuza ensinou-lhe como dar um soco básico, e esse soco salvou sua vida quando ele teve que se defender do traficante de drogas de sua mãe. Acabou tirando a vida do traficante, marcando-o como um assassino. Criminosos continuaram a persegui-lo, resultando em mais tragédias para as pessoas que tentaram cuidar dele. Tudo isso o levou a pedir ao mesmo ex-boxeador que o ensinasse a se tornar mais forte, o que o levou a um ginásio decadente, sua porta de entrada para o mundo do boxe profissional!

altTitles.th: ลูกแกะพันธุ์เสือเคนอิจิ

altTitles.ja: 史上最強の弟子ケンイチ

description.en: Shirahama Kenichi is a book lover who has just entered high school, but he is often bullied by others. One day, he became good friends with the new transfer student, Fuurinji Miu, who was also looking for a friend. Kenichi was shocked at how powerful she is at first, but he is still somehow attracted to her…so he later goes to the dojo of her family and starts a training that will change his life.

altTitles.en: I Won't Let Go of This Hand

description.en:
Kou and Yukako have been friends since elementary school but over the years Kou has fallen in love with his childhood friend and when he found out that she was moving as a result of her family mounting debts he was devastated at the prospect of losing his best friend and the woman he loved.  
  
That was back in junior high. A few years after their separation, Kou and Yukako meet again. Kou is happy to see her after so many years apart but at the same time shocked at how frail and thin she has become. The strong genki little girl he knew was gone and in her place stood a half-starved homeless girl forced to steal to eat.

Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

description.en: A bachelor for the past 11 years, Higuchi Yuuki is a male teacher in an all-girls school. He keeps wondering how to bridge the gap between himself and his students when he's suddenly confessed to by Ichikawa, one of his students! Although Higuchi rejects her, Ichikawa does all she can to get her teacher to turn her way – even if it means making him grope her and holding his hand in class! When Higuchi can't understand why she'd like an unimpressive and inexperienced guy like him, she kisses him! Will Higuchi be able to handle the feelings of his beautiful student, especially when she is not the only one to have fallen for him?!? A dramatic school love story unfolds!
description.es: Soltero desde hace 11 años, Higuchi Yuuki es profesor en una escuela sólo para chicas. No deja de preguntarse cómo acortar la distancia entre él y sus alumnos cuando repentinamente se confiesa Ichikawa, una de sus alumnas. Aunque Higuchi la rechaza, Ichikawa hace todo lo que puede para que su profesor se dé la vuelta… ¡incluso si eso significa que la manoseen y le tomen la mano en clase! ¡Cuando Higuchi no puede entender por qué le gustaría un chico tan poco impresionante e inexperto como él, lo besa! ¿Será Higuchi capaz de manejar los sentimientos de su bella alumna, especialmente cuando ella no es la única que se ha enamorado de él? ¡Se desarrolla una dramática historia de amor en la escuela!
description.fr: Célibataire depuis 11 ans, Higuchi Yuuki est professeur dans une école de filles. Il se demande comment combler le fossé qui le sépare de ses élèves lorsque Ichikawa, l'une de ses élèves, lui avoue soudainement son amour ! Bien que Higuchi la rejette, Ichikawa fait tout ce qu'elle peut pour amener son professeur à changer d'avis - même si cela signifie qu'il doit la tripoter et lui tenir la main en classe ! Lorsque Higuchi ne comprend pas pourquoi elle aime un garçon aussi peu impressionnant et inexpérimenté que lui, elle l'embrasse ! Higuchi sera-t-il capable de gérer les sentiments de sa belle étudiante, surtout quand elle n'est pas la seule à être tombée amoureuse de lui ? Une histoire d'amour dramatique se déroule dans une école !
description.ja: 教師になるのが夢だった。学校が好きで人が好きで、だけど彼女いない暦＝年齢。そんな僕が女子校の教師になった。そして、教師として生徒を指導するはずだった。百の迂遠な駆け引きよりも、たった一言「好き」がいい。ド直球JKに翻弄されるエロ＆キュンラブストーリー開幕!!
description.pt: Solteiro nos últimos 11 anos, Higuchi Yuuki é professor de uma escola só para garotas. Ele continua se perguntando como diminuir a distância entre ele e suas alunas quando de repente uma de suas alunas, Ichikawa, se confessa para ele! Embora Higuchi a rejeite, Ichikawa faz tudo o que pode para tentar convencer seu professor a aceitar sua confissão – mesmo que isso signifique fazê-lo tocá-la e segurar sua mão durante a aula! Quando Higuchi não consegue entender o motivo dela gostar de um cara inexpressivo e inexperiente como ele, ela o beija! Higuchi será capaz de lidar com os sentimentos da sua bela aluna, especialmente quando ela não é a única a se apaixonar por ele?! Uma dramática história de amor escolar começa!

altTitles.ja: わざと見せてる? 加茂井さん。

altTitles.en: Are You Showing It on Purpose?

description.en: Sudo, is an unassuming second-year junior high boy, who likes to draw. Kamoi-san, his classmate, is a JC in a short skirt who stands out everywhere she goes! These are the days between a flamboyant gal and an ordinary boy.
description.fr:
On suit l'histoire de Sutô, un jeune étudiant en seconde année du lycée plutôt banal voire transparent, mais qui a un passion pour les mangas et sait dessiner. Kamoi, la gyarû de sa classe, elle-même fan de manga, remarque les qualités de dessinateur de Sutô. 
S'installe entre eux une relation d'amitié, voir...
description.ja: 中学２年生の加茂井さんは、クラスに一人はいたようでいなかった、でもやっぱりいたＪＣギャル！　そんなクラスでも目立つ加茂井さんと、存在感のない地味な僕の物語。

description.en:
1) Mizu no Yakata (2 parts in the volume)  
  
A 14-year-old boy, after the loss of his parents, starts researching his older brother, who has mysteriously disappeared several years before. He finds him in a strange palace, with his two friends who had also disappeared. At first, the boy is happy, but then he discovers that something horrible has happened in that palace, and he might just become a victim too.  
  
*Note:* This is the oneshot of the movie that Sana and Naozumi starred in from Kodomo no Omocha.  
  
2) Pochi **Unscanlated**
description.pt-br: Um menino cujos pais morreram em um acidente de carro de repente se lembra que ele teve um irmão mais velho que desapareceu anos atrás. Em um esforço para encontrar seu único parente restante, ele sai em uma viagem para encontrá-lo, apenas para se encontrar em uma mansão misteriosa onde o fantasma da namorada de seu irmão os assombra.

title.en: The Story of a Girl Who's My Best Friend, She's Acting Strange Lately

altTitles.ja: 親友の女の子の様子が最近おかしい話

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinyuu no Onnanoko no Yousu ga Saikin Okashii Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of My Best Friend, a Girl Who's Acting Oddly These Days
The Story of a Best Friend, Who is a Girl Acts Odd Nowadays

description.en: My best friend is a girl I have known since elementary school.  She was like a boy, but nowadays she acts odd. We were like two guys, but now... she tries to increase the skinship and gets upset when I speak to girls.

Yukishiro Nanako is a cute, cheerful high school girl with one peculiar trait: instead of verbal communication, she writes senryu (a type of haiku) poems to relay her thoughts. Together with ex-delinquent Busujima Eiji, they are budding freshmen of the school's Literature Club.  
  
Even though Nanako doesn't talk, with the power of senryu, the adorable pair has no problem enjoying their fun school-life through the tune of 5-7-5 syllables.  


---
description.ru:
Юкиширо Нанако - милая и весёлая старшеклассница со специфичной чертой в общении: чтобы передать свои мысли, она пишет сэнрю (как хайку). Нанако вместе с бывшим хулиганом Бусуджимой Эйджи становятся новыми членами литературного клуба. И пусть девушка так странно разговаривает, но благодаря силе сэнрю эта прелестная пара без проблем наслаждается школьной жизнью.   
  
[Artist's twitter](https://twitter.com/igagarashi)
description.pt-br:
Yukishiro Nanako é uma colegial fofa e alegre com uma característica peculiar: em vez de comunicação verbal, ela escreve poemas senryuu (um tipo de haiku) para transmitir seus pensamentos. Junto com o ex-delinquente Busujima Eiji, eles são calouros iniciantes do Clube de Literatura da escola.

Embora Nanako não fale, com o poder do senryuu, o adorável par não tem problemas em aproveitar sua divertida vida escolar através da melodia de 5-7-5 sílabas.

description.en: High school freshmen and twins, Nae and Moe, and Ken and Takeshi, enjoy their lives as students and close friends. Until Moe suddenly dies in a traffic accident… and her corpse disappears? Between the vanishing corpse and a pharmaceutical corporation, her three remaining friends are struck with the reality that something is amiss in their world..

title.en: Walking with Death: Start From Murloc Dungeons

altTitles.zh: 与死亡同行：从鱼人地下城开始

description.en: After unlocking the hidden job "Death Walker", it is only natural for me to become a legendary adventurer... right?

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?
I Am the Youngest Daughter of Murim’s Strongest, the Namgung Clan

description.en:
"B-baa, baaah?! (Did I become a baby?! What about my revenge?!)
Everyone in the Namgung family despised me. My life was one where even my siblings turned their backs on me.
But at the moment when the family was annihilated, the choice my siblings made… was not the family, but me.

‘I never once thought of you as anything but family.’
‘Live. Even if it’s disgraceful and filthy, live, Ahee.’

Why did they save me?
A question I held in my heart my entire life as I carried out my revenge.
I thought I could finally close my eyes at the end of it all.

‘Baaah?’

I’ve returned to the past!
Could this be some black magic from the Blood Cult?
My… my revenge? My peaceful rest?!
And why are the Namgung siblings clinging to me again?!

What on earth is going on?!"

Are you looking for something new? Something challenging? Something very highly paid? Exterminating monsters is an exciting, fast-paced field that will get you out from behind a desk and into the action. With over 500 magical girl companies now in operation, you’re sure to find a position—and a uniform—that fits. Start your career as a magical girl today!

---
[Viz Official English Volumes](https://www.viz.com/magilumiere-magical-girls-inc)
description.ja: “魔法少女”――それは、誰もが憧れる「職業」である。　就職活動に苦戦する女子大生・桜木カナ。面接先で怪異に巻き込まれたカナは、駆けつけた魔法少女・越谷を手助けしたことをきっかけに、ベンチャー企業『株式会社マジルミエ』に魔法少女として新卒入社することになり…!?
description.ru: Манга про девочку, которая искала работу и попала в корпорацию девочек-волшебниц, борющихся с монстрами.

title.en: Ushiro no Seki no Gyaru ni Sukarete Shimatta -Mou Ore wa Damekamoshirenai-

altTitles.ja: うしろの席のぎゃるに好かれてしまった。　もう俺はダメかもしれない。

altTitles.en: The Gal is Sitting Behind Me, and Loves Me -Maybe I'm Screwed Already-

description.en:
***My school life has changed drastically just because she likes me that I barely talk with?!***

Yuizaki Shino, one of the most beautiful girls in the school is a classmate of Fujiwara Sandai sitting behind him. It was only on a whim that Sandai helped her out despite spent his days studying and not having a single friend. It was supposed to be―

*"I couldn't wait for after school! ....Hey, hold on a minute?"*

That day and moment led Sandai to start dating Shino. They spend time together after school, they keep up with each other's hobbies, and they stay over frequently.... She's kind-sweet and always clings to him. And somehow, the other classmates started to pay attention to Sandai, they slowly changing his style appearance, and there was a lot of talks around his belt. He's more unsettled than when Sandai alone before. ....Well, this kind of school life isn't so bad, is it?

---

****Note: Earlier release chapter will be on Monthly Comic Dengeki Daioh before Comic Walker release***
description.ja:
何の接点も無い彼女に好かれた…だけで、俺の学園生活が激変!?

　うしろの席の同級生で、学校有数の美少女ギャル・結崎志乃。

勉強ばかりで、友達が一人もいない日々を過ごす俺が、彼女を助けたのは、ほんの気まぐれにすぎなかった。
そのはずが――

「放課後が待ち遠しかった！　……ね、ちゅーして？」

　その出来事をきっかけに、俺は志乃と付き合うことになった。
学校が終われば一緒に過ごして、お互いの趣味に付き合って、頻繁にお泊まりして……
彼女は優しく、いつも俺にべったり。

　さらにクラスメイトに注目されるようになって、俺の見た目を改造してくれたり、俺の周りも騒がしく。
一人の時より、落ち着かないんだが……ま、こんな学校生活も悪くはないか。

---

- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054921974753)
- [Official LN (JP)](https://fantasiabunko.jp/special/202206ushironoseki)

description.en:
Youichi is a very serious, stoic young man with a girlfriend and a regular sex life. However, he has never experienced sexual self-gratification.  
  
Recently, he's become aware of a book called "Masturbation" at the library he works at – an educated discourse into the history of the sin of Onan and related practices. Finding himself increasingly intrigued by the concepts within, he begins to conduct a series of experiments… Join him as he embarks into a whole new world!

title.en: Seitokai ni mo Ana wa Aru!

altTitles.en: There is Also a Hole in the Student Organization!
Even the Student Council has Holes

altTitles.vi: Hội học sinh cũng lắm trò vui!

description.en: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.
description.ja: この生徒会の面子ときたら、あほの子だったり、恐ろしかったり、むっつりだったり、ちょっと変！ でも、それがなんだか、妙に可愛く思える今日この頃……。

description.en: Let the standard adventure story of extremely normal(?) people begin!

altTitles.en: Yuri Yuri dj - Yuri Yuri After

description.en:
A series of original doujinshi that Namori published under her circle ELEGY SYNDROME, each volumes contain several extra stories by various guest artists.  
  
Volumes 1-3 & 5, were done by Namori herself. The rest of these volumes are extra stories from other artists.

altTitles.ja-ro: Gift - Shikkoku no, Yakusoku no Basho no, Nozonda Juujika no
Gift - Shiroi Kemono no, Kikoenu Koe no, Mienai Ondo no
Gift - Usubeni Meku Sora no, Hotobiru Rasen no, Hikaru Kishibe no

altTitles.ja: Gift 白い獣の、聞こえぬ声の、見えない温度の
Gift 薄紅めく空の、潤びる螺旋の、光る岸辺の
Gift 赤い桎梏の、約束の場所の、望んだ十字架の

description.en: Yutaka works as a trainer at his father's boxing gym. In a dark alley one day, he runs into Kei, who fights off several thugs. Trying to help a young delinquent get off the street, Yutaka invites Kei to the gym. But Kei is no ordinary delinquent…

altTitles.zh-ro: Lian'ai Rang Wo Youle Chao Nengli

altTitles.en: Falling In Love Gives Me Superpowers

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士クロスボーン・ガンダム ゴースト

description.en: Universal Century 0153. 17 years have passed since the "Steel Seven" defeated the remnants of the Jupiter Empire. As a new conflict brews between a Side 2 faction known as the Zanscare Empire and the League Militaire/Earth Federation. A high schooler on Side 3, Font Baud, is hunted by Zanscare special forces when he discovers their secret Newtype weapon. However, he encounters a little girl, who is accompanied by a blind man and is rescued by the strange return of a mobile suit that defeated the Jovians.

altTitles.ja: さよならピーターパン

description.en:
Never far from the future. In this world, all children are gathered up onto an island known as the “Juvenile Circle”. They receive their education there until the age of 18, when they graduate and go into society as adults. A boy named “Shizu” was overcome with strange feelings of anxiety the day after his graduation. Were they directed towards becoming an adult? Does he want to remain a child? It was neither of these. Anxiety embraced Shizu. The anxiety would lead him towards the “truth” of his world.  
————————————————————————-
description.it: Non è mai lontano dal futuro. In questo mondo, tutti i bambini sono riuniti su un'isola conosciuta come il "Circolo dei giovani". Lì ricevono la loro istruzione fino all'età di 18 anni, quando si laureano e si inseriscono nella società da adulti. Un ragazzo di nome "Shizu" è stato sopraffatto da strani sentimenti di ansia il giorno dopo la sua laurea. Sono stati indirizzati a diventare adulti? Vuole rimanere un bambino? Non era nessuna delle due cose. L'ansia abbracciava Shizu. L'ansia lo avrebbe condotto verso la "verità" del suo mondo.
description.pt-br: "Neste mundo, todas as crianças estão reunidas em uma ilha conhecida como 'Círculo Juvenil'. Lá, elas são educadas até os 18 anos, quando se formam e entram na sociedade como adultos. Um menino chamado Shizu foi tomado por estranhos sentimentos de inquietação no dia anterior a sua formatura. Era o medo de se tornarem adultos? Ele quer continuar criança? A ansiedade o abraçou. A ansiedade o levaria para a verdade de seu mundo." "Neste mundo, todas as crianças estão reunidas em uma ilha conhecida como 'Círculo Juvenil'. Lá, elas são educadas até os 18 anos, quando se formam e entram na sociedade como adultos. Um menino chamado Shizu foi tomado por estranhos sentimentos de inquietação no dia anterior a sua formatura. Era o medo de se tornarem adultos? Ele quer continuar criança? A ansiedade o abraçou. A ansiedade o levaria para a verdade de seu mundo."

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me "Master"!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

description.en: Tsumugui and Shinobima Saguri loved exploring as kids, but Saguri had a weak constitution. When Saguri moved away when both were four, they promised to go exploring when they're older. Couple of years, Saguri moves back, healthy, and ready to explore!

altTitles.ja: サディスティックビューティー

description.en: The lives of two men are thrown into chaos when the sexy Chun Duna returns to town. On one end is student Woo Haesol whose timid nature reveals a man just begging to be dominated. On the other is Professor Byun Minho, a male chauvinist who bitterly views Duna as his mortal enemy. Tempers flare as pain turns into pleasure under the watchful eye of a sadistic beauty.

altTitles.ja-ro: Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan - Hokkaido-hen
Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan: Hokkaidou Hen

altTitles.es-la: Rurouni Kenshin: Una historia romántica de un espadachín de la era Meiji - Arco de Hokkaido

altTitles.ja: るろうに剣心―明治剣客浪漫譚・北海道編―

description.en:
It is the 16th year of the Meiji era. Five years have passed since Kenshin Himura stopped the uprising of Makoto Shishio. Though the flames of his budding revolution were extinguished, the scars left in its wake are still felt across Japan. Remnants of his group—though scattered—still exist. Some have found peace while others continue to fight.  
  
After a remaining faction tried to revive the revolution, Shishio's old sword fell into the hands of Ashitarou Hasegawa, an orphan boy who has never known a home. The conflict also leaves both Aran Inoue, a 16-year-old half-Japanese, half-American boy, and a mercenary girl named Asahi Kubota with a hefty price to pay off, with nowhere else to go. But luckily for these individuals, the Kamiya dojo has always been a place to accept wanderers without prying into their pasts.  
  
The three are keen to start fresh, so when two members of Asahi's former clan show up demanding her return, Asahi refuses and things start to get ugly. In the midst of the chaos, the clan members drop a package containing a picture of dojo proprieter Kaoru Kamiya's presumably deceased father and his location—Hakodate, Hokkaido. With only this information, the members of the Kamiya dojo embark on an adventure across the sea in the hopes of finding news about Kaoru's father and the reason he is being targeted.



---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Samurai X: Hokkaido Arc** (2022)
description.ja: 伝説の人斬り・抜刀斎こと緋村剣心――明治十六年の東京で、時に倭杖を手に困窮している人のため剣を振るうも、妻・薫、息子・剣路と平穏に日々を過ごしていた。ある時、一枚の写真から、薫の亡父・越路郎が北海道で生きていることが判明。剣心達は北海道に向かうが…!?　“不殺”の流浪人の新たな浪漫譚、開幕……!!
description.es-la:
Es el año 16 de la era Meiji. Han pasado cinco años desde que Kenshin Himura detuvo el levantamiento de Makoto Shishio. Aunque las llamas de su incipiente revolución se extinguieron, las cicatrices que dejó su estela aún se sienten en todo Japón. Todavía existen restos de su grupo, aunque dispersos. Algunos han encontrado la paz, mientras que otros siguen luchando.

Después de que una facción restante intentara revivir la revolución, la vieja espada de Shishio cayó en manos de Ashitarou Hasegawa, un niño huérfano que nunca ha conocido un hogar. El conflicto también deja a Aran Inoue, un chico de 16 años mestizo de japonés y americano, y a una chica mercenaria llamada Asahi Kubota con un precio muy alto que pagar, sin ningún otro lugar al que ir. Pero, por suerte para estos individuos, el dojo Kamiya siempre ha sido un lugar que acepta a los vagabundos sin hurgar en sus pasados.

Los tres quieren empezar de cero, así que cuando dos miembros del antiguo clan de Asahi aparecen exigiendo su regreso, ésta se niega y las cosas empiezan a ponerse feas. En medio del caos, los miembros del clan dejan caer un paquete que contiene una foto del padre del dojo de Kaoru Kamiya, presumiblemente fallecido, y su ubicación: Takodate, Hokkaido. Con sólo esta información, los miembros del dojo Kamiya se embarcan en una aventura a través del mar con la esperanza de encontrar noticias sobre el padre de Kaoru y la razón por la que se le persigue.

description.en: Nae Yeon who walked in the forest with her memories lost, Dongcheol approaches her, and she tries to raid Naeon.

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

description.en:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

description.en: After losing both her job and her work due to the schemes of the PD she worked with, Yeonwoo learns the truth and faces death from a heart attack. She thought her life was ending there, but when she opens her eyes, she finds herself back to her youngest writer days 20 years ago. Can this second chance at life turn into a successful one unlike before? The story of Yeonwoo, the youngest writer in broadcasting with a career-oriented perspective, begins anew.
This story will show the drifting soul of a lone mangaka whose heart has been used up.
description.ru: Известный мангака заканчивает сериализацию манги. 10 лет неустанного труда. 30 лет жизни. Ради чего жил, и что оставило время.
description.pt-br: Fazer dinheiro é a única coisa que importa. E se seu primeiro mangá acabou e você não faz ideia de como começar o próximo. Seu casamento está acabando e seu amor por mangás foi destruído pela realidade cruel da industria e nada parece preencher o vazio dentro de você...

description.en: In a time when Gods ruled with cruelty, no one dared to oppose them! A girl was offered to the wind god as a sacrifice. A tribe leader sets off on a journey of redemption while trying to save the girl and make her his wife. Kiron, while defying the Gods will, departs for a difficult journey. Will he be successful? And what kind of obstacles will the Gods throw at him?

What happens when next door to upcoming mangaka Fujiwara moves Yuuki, who was his teacher back in high school and first crush?  
  
Yuuki, now a married woman, is starting a new life in the city, however her husband is always away on business trips. She finds comfort in the company of her former student, but what she doesn't realize is that Fujiwara can listen to everything happening in her apartment through the building's thin walls…
description.ja: 東京。繁華街から離れた閑静な住宅街で連載漫画家を目指す青年・藤原秋。ある日、隣の部屋に新たな住人が引っ越してきた。その隣人は藤原の高校の恩師・仲井間真。偶然の再会に喜ぶ二人。しかしその晩。藤原は耳にする。隣の部屋から漏れる、仲井間の嬌声。自らの欲望を抑えられず、藤原は隣室を覗き込む。そこにはかつての恩師のあられもない姿が…!?隣人愛欲物語。淫靡の世界の幕がいま、開く。

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! Official Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja-ro: Onii-chan wa Oshimai! Koushiki Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい！ 公式アンソロジーコミック

altTitles.ru: Мой братик теперь не братик! Официальная комикс-антология!

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢たちは揺るがない

description.en:
It has been half a year since Aini Mikkola, the saintess in training who hails from a barony in the countryside, arrived at the Royal Academy. 

The school is in turmoil. 

The boys, the sons of aristocrats, are at the mercy of Aini's innocent, natural cuteness, while the girls are angry at her disregard for the manners of the aristocracy. In the midst of all this, there were three daughters who were dubbed “the villainesses,” in reference to a popular story. Seraphina, the crown prince's fiancée and the daughter of an upright marquise. Sandra, the noble daughter of a viscount who made their wealth from commerce. Bernardetta, the brilliant daughter of the current Prime Minister's who is a marquise. 

When a sense of disquiet begins to grow in the school, these women finally stand up! To correct Aini's mistakes and to follow their own hearts.

This is a record of the battle between the three “villainesses” and the saintly apprentices, a battle for the way of life of women.

Han Sang-hyun is a boy that dreams of becoming a manhwaka, and one day he hears a story that falls like lightning from a clear sky - he has a fiance he never knew about. After not being able to win against his grandfather he goes to the meeting against his will, however the lady he meets there is a girl who appears to be a rich spoiled girl named Yu Suh-eun. After having a fight with the girl who acts negatively to him, he comes back to his house to find that Yu Suh-eun is in his house!? What? The new house they'll be staying in is the "Marriage House".

altTitles.ja: ルナティックサーカス

description.en: "Lunatic Circus" is a story about the circus called "Lunatic Circus", which is said to be the best in post WWII Japan, which has achieved an incredibly rapid economic growth. The star of the circus, Ryunosuke, and all the other trapeze artists, are the protagonists of this manga. This is the story of their dreams, their fears, their struggles and their hopes.

title.en: Defective Goddess' Genesis of Another World

altTitles.ja: ポンコツ女神の異世界創世録

altTitles.en: A Disappointing Goddess’ Genesis of Another Universe

description.en:
Artesia Gaia Nagasus,  
The goddess of creation went into a deep slumber in order to bring new life to the fallen planet,  
And to prepare for the inevitable arrival of the Brave, whom she would then provide with guidance.  
However, she woke up too early… Not only was there no Brave waiting for her, she was met with an extremely cold glacial period without intelligent life…?!  
  
She just wants to be worshipped and fall in love!  
This is a tale of creation, starring a defective goddess who can't help but mess with humanity, and her journey to set the world in motion - with a few troubles here, and a little hard work there.

Yayano, an eighth grader, moved to Atami with her mother from Tokyo. A somewhat rustic hotel is her mother's new workplace. Yayano is full of anxiety, but there she witnesses her mother's surprising appearance...! For Yayano, this is the first turning point in her life!?
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/polestar_mo)
description.ja: 男運の悪い母に連れられて、熱海へと引っ越してきた女子中学生の“ややの”。母の就職先である老舗のホテルは、その昔に母がポールダンサーとして輝いていた場所だった。当時の面影がない体型であっても、改めてダンサーとして認められようとして懸命に踊る母の姿に、なぜかドキドキしてしまうややの。それまで特に夢を持たずに生きてきた彼女の中に、何かが生まれた瞬間だった──。一本のポールが少女の運命を変える！

description.en: Violence!!!! Shootouts!!!! Zombies!!!! Electricity!!!! An office life comedy with no straight man begins.

altTitles.th: เจ้าสาวแห่งทางสายไหม

description.ar: تدور أحداث القصة في بلدة ريفية بالقرب من بحر قزوين في آسيا الوسطى خلال أواخر القرن التاسع عشر عند الغزو الروسي ، وتدور القصة حول امرأة شابة ، أمير ، تصل من قرية بعيدة عبر الجبال لتتزوج كارلوك ، شاب ثماني سنوات. صغارها. يتتبع المسلسل علاقتهما أثناء تطورها ، بينما يقدم قصصًا أخرى حول مختلف الشابات وحياتهن اليومية مع خطيبهن وأزواجهن على طول طريق الحرير .
description.de: Die zwanzigjährige Amira wird von ihrem Clan zu einer Familie jenseits der Berge geschickt, damit sie deren zwölfjährigen Sohn Karluk heiratet. Nach der Hochzeit fügt sich Amira schnell in ihre neue Familie ein. Während sie einige Zeit nach ihrer Hochzeit mit Karluk entfernte Verwandte seines Clans besucht, beschließt ihre eigene Familie, sie zurückzufordern, da sie mit Amira andere Pläne haben...
description.en:
Central Asia, mid-19th century: in a rural town near the Caspian Sea, a young woman named Amir arrives from a distant village across the mountains to marry Karluk, a boy eight years her junior. The story unfolds among details of everyday family and community life. However, the peaceful atmosphere is disturbed when Amir's family demands to take her back to their village.

---
- **Won the 7th Manga Taisho Award in 2014**
description.es: Ambientada en una ciudad rural cerca del mar Caspio en Asia Central a finales del siglo xix, la historia gira en torno a una joven llamada Amira, que llega de un pueblo distante a través de las montañas para casarse con Karluk, un joven ocho años menor que ella. La serie sigue su relación a medida que se desarrolla, al tiempo que presenta otras historias sobre varias mujeres jóvenes y su vida cotidiana con sus respectivos novios y esposos a lo largo de la Ruta de la Seda.
description.fi: Tarina seuraa aluksi tuoreen morsiamen, Amiran, sekä hänen uuden perheensä elämää. Myöhemmin muun muassa kuljetaan tutkimusmatkailijan seurassa ja tutustutaan uusiin seutuihin ja uusiin morsiamiin. Upea piirrosjälki, taidokas tunnelmanluonti, uskottavasti rakennettu eksoottinen miljöö sekä useat kiinnostavat henkilöhahmot tekevät Aron morsiamista vuoden mangatapauksen!
description.fr:
La vie d’Amir, 20 ans, est bouleversée le jour où elle est envoyée dans le clan voisin pour y être mariée. Elle y rencontre Karluk, son futur époux… un garçon de huit ans son cadet ! Autre village, autres mœurs… La jeune fille, chasseuse accomplie, découvre une existence différente, entre l’aïeule acariâtre, une ribambelle d’enfants et Smith, l’explorateur anglais venu étudier leurs traditions.

Mais avant même que le jeune couple ait eu le temps de se faire à sa nouvelle vie, le couperet tombe : pour conclure une alliance plus avantageuse avec un puissant voisin, le clan d’Amir décide de récupérer la jeune femme coûte que coûte…
description.id:
Karluk Eyhon dan Amira Hargal adalah pasangan suami istri dengan usia terpaut delapan tahun (Amira 20 tahun dan Karluk 12 tahun). Setelah menikah mereka tinggal bersama dengan Keluarga Karluk.
Hubungan keduanya pun berjalan dengan baik. Namun, ketenangan mereka kemudian terusik oleh kedatangan kakak serta sepupu Amira yang berniat membawanya pulang. Apa yang sebenarnya terjadi!?
description.it: Tardo XIX secolo, nelle vicinanze del Mar Caspio in Asia centrale, lungo la via della seta. La ventenne Amira viene mandata dalle montagne in cui vive ad un altro villaggio, per sposare il più giovane Karluk, appena dodicenne. Dopo gli iniziali imbarazzi per la differenza di età fra i due, il loro rapporto comincia ad essere sempre più unito e Amira inizia ad abituarsi alla vita della tribù e ad integrarsi nella comunità, ma la pace viene disturbata quando delle persone della famiglia di Amira raggiungono il villaggio per riprenderla con loro.
description.ja: 美貌の娘・アミル（20歳）が嫁いだ相手は、若干12歳の少年・カルルク。遊牧民と定住民、８歳の年の差を越えて、ふたりは結ばれるのか……？　『エマ』で19世紀末の英国を活写した森薫の最新作はシルクロードの生活文化。馬の背に乗り弓を構え、悠久の大地に生きるキャラクターたちの物語！
description.ko:
독특한 감성으로 큰 인기를 끌며 많은 사랑을 받았던 만화 <엠마>의 작가 모리카오루의 신작. 19세기 중앙아시아의 실크로드를 배경으로 한 장대한 스케일의 내용과 섬세하고 화려한 그림 그리고 한층 성숙된 탄탄한 스토리로 무장하였다. 드넓은 중앙 아시아를 배경으로 이야기가 펼쳐진다.

이제 무대는 중앙아시아 실크로드. 끝없는 대지에서 살아가는 유목 정착민의 낮과 밤이 펼쳐지는 카스피 해 인근의 지방도시. 아름다운 연상의 신부 아미루와 소년에서 어른이 되어가는 어린 신랑 카르르크는 부부가 된다. 다른 부족에서 시집온 아미루와 어린 신랑 카르르크의 평화롭고 행복한 시간도 잠시. 이 두 부부에게 다가오는 어두운 계획이 꿈틀거리기 시작한다.
description.ne:
मध्य एशिया, 19 औं शताब्दीको मध्य: 
क्यास्पियन सागर नजिकैको एक ग्रामीण सहरमा, आमिरा नामकी युवती आफू भन्दा आठ वर्ष कान्छो केटा कार्लुकसँग विवाह गर्न पहाड पारी टाढाको गाउँबाट आइपुग्छिन्।  
कथा दैनिक परिवार र सामुदायिक जीवनको विवरणहरूको बारेमा हो।
तर, आमिराको परिवारले उनलाई आफ्नो गाउँ फर्काउन माग गर्दा शान्तिपूर्ण वातावरण खलबलिएको छ।
description.pl: Dwudziestoletnia Amir zostaje wydana za młodszego o 8 lat Karluka. Dziewczyna opuszcza swoje koczownicze plemię, by zamieszkać wraz z mężem i jego rodziną w odległym mieście na Jedwabnym Szlaku. Uzdolniona w łucznictwie i jeździectwie, otwarta i bezpośrednia Amir próbuje odnaleźć swoje miejsce w nowej społeczności. Gdy między nią a Karlukiem rozkwita głębsze uczucie, w mieście pojawia się starszy brat Amir, żądając unieważnienia małżeństwa. Między dwoma rodzinami wybucha spór.
description.ru: Это истории из жизни Амиры - прекрасной лучницы и наездницы, посланной за горы, чтобы выйти замуж за Карлука - одного из поселенцев, который младше её на 8 лет. Благодаря многим своим умениям, Амира быстро находит себе место среди жителей деревни. Но всё меняется, когда люди из деревни Амиры решают забрать её назад.
description.th: ตั้งอยู่ในเมืองชนบทใกล้ทะเลแคสเปียนในเอเชียกลางในช่วงปลายศตวรรษที่ 19 ที่รัสเซียพิชิตเรื่องราวหมุนรอบหญิงสาวคนหนึ่งชื่ออาเมียร์ที่มาจากหมู่บ้านห่างไกลข้ามภูเขาเพื่อแต่งงานกับคาร์ลุก ชายหนุ่มอายุแปดขวบ จูเนียร์ของเธอ ชุดนี้ความสัมพันธ์ของพวกเขาในขณะที่มันพัฒนาในขณะที่การนำตุ๊กตุ่นอื่น ๆ เกี่ยวกับหญิงสาวที่ต่างๆและชีวิตประจำวันของพวกเขากับคู่หมั้นของตนและสามีไปตามเส้นทางสายไหม
description.uk: Події цієї романтично-пригодницької історії розгортаються у Середній Азії позаминулого століття. Молода дівчина Аміра із суворого кочового клану прибуває до селища, щоб вийти заміж за Карлука. Це незвичайний шлюб – адже наречений молодший за неї на вісім років. Однак найбільше бажання Аміри – стати йому гарною дружиною. Вона усіма силами старається догодити і йому, і своїй новій родині, дивуючи давно осілих землеробів своїми талантами.
description.vi:
Vào thế kỉ 19, ở khu vực Trung Á, tại một vùng thị tứ gần biển Caspi…

Có một cô dâu đã vượt qua bao núi đồi để đến bên một “chú rể nhỏ”.
Cô hoang dã, đáng yêu, chân thành, đáng quý.
Vút qua thảo nguyên xanh ngời, cô bên “chàng” cưỡi ngựa du ca.
Giương cung hướng lên trời, cô đem về biết bao ngạc nhiên, kì lạ.

Đây là câu chuyện về một phương trời xa xôi huyền bí.
Câu chuyện trên Con đường Tơ lụa lắm diệu kì.
Nơi cuộc sống diễn ra trong bao la, hào sảng.
Trong những hành trình, trong tình người và trong những lời ca.

Cùng với đó, không thể không nhắc đến nét vẽ tài hoa, tỉ mỉ đến tuyệt vời của tác giả, sẽ khắc họa những nét văn hóa quyến rũ đến lạ kì của một vùng Trung Á bát ngát, bao la.
description.zh-hk: 故事設定在19世紀後半，中亞與裏海週邊的草原地帶。以12岁的少年哈剌鲁和比他大8岁的新娘爱米尔为起頭，描写在丝绸之路的游牧民族和定居民族的生活。 由數個新娘的故事組成，新娘年齡不一，來自不同的地方。有各個角色的互動凸顯出當地的民俗風情。

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

title.en: Otaku no Tonari wa Elf desu ka?

altTitles.ja: おたくの隣りはエルフですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku no Tonari wa ERUFU Desuka?

altTitles.en: Does a Hot Elf Live Next Door to You?

altTitles.es-la: ¿Es una Elfa lo que está junto a ti?

description.en: In the year 20XX, Japan began exchanging ideas and cultures with other worlds. One day, a beautiful elf moves into the apartment next to Keita Inudo, a high school boy who aspires to be a Mangaka. But she won't be the only girl to push herself into Keita's daily life! Will he be able to cope with all these sudden appearances while keeping his home, his career aspirations, and his sanity intact?
description.es: ¡¡De la autora del famoso Romcom, “Hajimete na gal”!! ¡Un caballero y súper hermosa elfo se mudó a la habitación al lado de Keita, un chico de preparatoria que aspira a ser un Mangaka!  Y es que Japón en el año 20xx ha comenzado una nueva era de grandes intercambios con mundos diferentes. Y ahora Keita, ¡De alguna manera es empujado hacia bellezas de otros mundos! ¡¡Sera una extraordinaria explosión de amor o qué tipo de sorpresas serán las que destruirán la vida cotidiana de Keita!
description.ja: 20××年、異世界との大交流時代が始まった日本。アパートで一人暮らしをする漫画家希望の男子高生・犬童ケイタの隣りの部屋にハイエルフの美女騎士が引っ越してきた。「獄焔のスルト」を名乗る彼女は、漫画・ラノベ大好きなオタエルフだった！犬童のイタズラに怒ったスルトは、爆裂魔法をぶっ放し、宣言する。「この身に恥辱を与えた者は、殺す！‥‥か、愛するかだっ」

description.en: High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women. Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again. However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five!
description.ja:
本物の恋心を、あなたは見抜けるか。

女性を恐れる男子高校生・大石饗。彼に突然告白してきた、5人の少女。そのうち4人は、人間の恋愛感情を喰らう生物「恋喰（こいばみ）」。彼女たちに恋愛感情を食べられると、二度と恋をすることができなくなってしまう。ただ、本当の告白をした1人の気持ちを、見捨てるわけにはいかない――饗は覚悟を決め、5人の中から、本命の1人を見つけだすことを決意する！
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.ja: 押しかけギャルの中村さん

description.en: Akiyama and Nakamura-san are polar opposites. As an easily flustered otaku, Akiyama can’t even imagine a world where an outgoing, flashy gal like Nakamura wants anything to do with him. But after she saves his life, she demands something unbelievable—to live with him! Proud, bold, and unafraid to show off her body, Nakamura is the perfect image of a gyaru. Except, the moment she’s apart from Akiyama, she becomes a flustered, blushing mess. Discover what sweetness lies beneath the surface in this odd couple rom-com!
